data.name: Hazard Ops: Free Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Brutal carnage and hard-hitting action that will teach even veteran players the meaning of fear: That’s the essence of Hazard Ops. If you want to be more than cannon fodder on these battlefields, you’ve really got to bring it!

But that’s no reason to throw in the towel. This free starter pack fully equips new mercenaries for the mayhem of Hazard Ops. With three bad-ass weapons (the explosive K2 assault rifle will soon become your best friend in combat), a useful mod, and loads of other items, you’ll get a real leg up in the game.

Weapons & Mods

  • Big Time Tesla Crossbow Box
  • K2 Assault Rifle (7 days)
  • Katana (7 days)
  • AR High-Capacity Mag (7 days)

Consumables

  • 3x Cyclone Turret
  • 1x Key Card
  • 3x Supply Drop

So charge into battle, ready your weapon, and fire away!

English*, French, German

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.0GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 9800GT or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista, 7 or 8
  • Processor: Intel i-Series or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT240 or newer (equals Radeon 3650 series)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
